message:
I am very pleased to announce the general availability of Windows Azure Infrastructure Services. This new service now makes it possible for customers to move applications into the cloud.
:)
story: Mohamed Sameeh Sharaf shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: The Power of ‘And’ - Windows Azure  - Site Home - MSDN Blogs
caption: blogs.msdn.com
description: Today is an exciting day for Microsoft, Windows Azure and all of our customers around the world.  I am very pleased to announce the general availability of Windows Azure Infrastructure Services. This new service now makes it possible for customers to move applications into the cloud.
